field.name: summary
field.value: [PATCH] Allow Castle.Services.Logging.log4netIntegration to report correct values for location info patterns: %line, %logger, %file, etc.

field.name: description
field.value:
I didn't see a "Services" component in JIRA so I hope this is an ok place to post the informtaion.
Currently when you log information using Castle.Services.Logging.log4netIntegration:
Log4netFactory factory = new Log4netFactory(); ILogger log = factory.Create(typeof(Log4netLoggerTest).FullName); log.Debug("Hello"); // line 17 log.Debug("World"); // line 18 log.Debug("Foo"); // line 19 log.Debug("Bar"); // line 20 log.Debug("Baz"); // line 21
in conjuction with the location info patterns of log4net (most of the pattenrs that have a WARNING in their description):
http://tinyurl.com/bx3ep http://logging.apache.org/log4net/release/sdk/index.html
the log file reports that the messages as being generated from line 79 of Log4netLogger. Line 79 is:
_log.Debug(message);
In some respects this is correct but it would be better to show the user what line in _their_ code the call to Debug came from. When I use this conversion pattern:
"%line - %message%newline"
I should see this in my output:
17 - Hello 18 - World 19 - Foo 20 - Bar 21 - Baz
not this:
79 - Hello 79 - World 79 - Foo 79 - Bar 79 - Baz
The XML remarks of this class has more information:
http://tinyurl.com/7836t http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/ibatis/trunk/cs/mapper/IBatisNet.Common.Logging.Log4Net/Log4NetLogger.cs
